mapper.select:
SELECT /* WBFASmartRoundMapper.selectSmartRoundList */ * FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE01' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 'STATE02' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE03' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN 'STATE04' ELSE 'STATE05' END AS DATE_STATE_CD ,CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수대기' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' ELSE '마감' END AS ACCT_STATUS , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 2 WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 1 ELSE 3 END AS DATE_ORD , DATEDIFF(ACCS_END_DTM,NOW()) AS D_DAY ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A WHERE BSN_CD = #{bsnCd} ) A
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC
ORDER BY DATE_ORD, CASE WHEN DATE_ORD = 1 THEN ACCS_END_DTM WHEN DATE_ORD = 2 THEN ACCS_STRT_DTM WHEN DATE_ORD = 3 THEN CASE WHEN BSN_END_DTM IS NULL THEN ACCS_END_DTM ELSE BSN_END_DTM END END
LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT /* WBFASmartRoundMapper.getRecentRoundDtl */ * FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM ,EXPS_YN , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 2 WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 1 ELSE 3 END AS DATE_ORD FROM CX_EPISD_MST A WHERE BSN_CD = #{bsnCd} AND EXPS_YN = 'Y' ) A WHERE DATE_ORD = 1 ORDER BY ACCS_STRT_DTM, BSN_STRT_DTM ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT /* WBFASmartRoundMapper.selectOPtnList */ * FROM ( SELECT OPTN_SEQ , A.STAGE_SEQ , OPTN_NM , OPTN_ORD , FILE_SEQ , STAGE_ORD FROM CX_OPTN_DTL A JOIN CX_STAGE_DTL B ON A.STAGE_SEQ = B.STAGE_SEQ AND B.BSN_CD = #{bsnCd} AND B. FILE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY OPTN_ORD ASC ) TMP WHERE TMP.STAGE_ORD = #{stageOrd}

SELECT /* WBFASmartRoundMapper.selectSmartRoundList */ COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE01' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 'STATE02' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE03' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN 'STATE04' ELSE 'STATE05' END AS DATE_STATE_CD ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A WHERE BSN_CD = #{bsnCd} ) A
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC
SELECT /* WBFASmartRoundMapper.selectYearDtl */ MIN(YEAR) AS YEAR FROM CX_EPISD_MST

SELECT /* WBFASmartRoundMapper.selectRoundDetail */ EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID ,REG_IP ,(SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID=INFO.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID ,(SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID=INFO.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_IP ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST INFO WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey}
SELECT /* WBFASmartRoundMapper.selectGiveList */ GIVE_SEQ ,EPISD_SEQ ,GIVE_ORD ,STRT_DT ,END_DT FROM CX_EPISD_GIVE_DTL WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey} ORDER BY GIVE_SEQ ASC

SELECT /* WBFASmartRoundMapper.selectAssignmentList */ bsn_optn_seq ,episd_seq ,optn_cd ,optn_nm ,optn_ord FROM cx_episd_bsn_optn_dtl WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey} AND optn_cd = #{optnCd} ORDER BY bsn_optn_seq ASC

SELECT /* WBFASmartRoundMapper.selectBusinessList */ bsn_optn_seq ,episd_seq ,optn_cd ,optn_nm ,optn_ord FROM cx_episd_bsn_optn_dtl WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey} AND optn_cd = #{optnCd} ORDER BY bsn_optn_seq ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) /*WBFASmartRoundMapper.getRegisterChk*/ FROM cx_appctn_mst WHERE episd_seq IN
#{item}

SELECT /* WBFASmartRoundMapper.getApplyCount */ COUNT(*) FROM CX_APPCTN_MST A JOIN CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL B ON A.appctn_seq = B.appctn_seq AND B.rsume_ord = 1 WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{episdSeq} AND MEM_SEQ = #{memSeq} AND APPCTN_STTS_CD != 'PRO_TYPE02001_01_004'
mapper.delete:
DELETE /* WBFASmartRoundMapper.deleteGiveList */ FROM CX_EPISD_GIVE_DTL WHERE EPISD_SEQ IN
#{item}

if.test: strtDt != null and strtDt != ''.toString() and endDt != null and endDt != ''.toString()

when.if: AND ( ACCS_STRT_DTM BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') OR ACCS_END_DTM BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') OR STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN ACCS_STRT_DTM AND ACCS_END_DTM OR STR_TO_DATE(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN ACCS_STRT_DTM AND ACCS_END_DTM )

if.test: strtDt != null and strtDt != ''.toString() and endDt != null and endDt != ''.toString()

when.if: AND ( BSN_STRT_DTM BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') OR BSN_END_DTM BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') OR STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN BSN_STRT_DTM AND BSN_END_DTM OR STR_TO_DATE(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN BSN_STRT_DTM AND BSN_END_DTM )

if.test: strtDt != null and strtDt != ''.toString() and endDt != null and endDt != ''.toString()

when.if: AND REG_DTM > STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_DTM < DATE_ADD(str_to_date(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)

if.test: strtDt != null and strtDt != ''.toString() and endDt != null and endDt != ''.toString()

when.if: AND MOD_DTM > STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND MOD_DTM < DATE_ADD(str_to_date(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)

choose.when: AND EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')))
AND EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')))
choose.otherwise: AND ( EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%'))) OR EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%'))) )
